divs: Sighting DetailsThe object hovered and darted about for 16 minutes at an altitude of approximately100 ft. from the ground,the object was an unusually bright blue and its outline was clear and distictive making no noise what soo ever. Strangly enough,what drew my attention to the the object was the feeling of static in the air that raised the hairs on my arms and neck and what could only be described as the feeling of walking through a giant magnetic chamber as to the waves of magnetic resonanance that I felt when the thing first got my attention. The object was like an elongated tear drop shape that didn't alter orin any way and as I stated earlier, it would dart off in one direction then come to a dead stop from a blazing speed with out slowing down and then wouldjust as suddenly change direction some times without even stopping.
Summary: for almost 16 minutes the object hovered and darted at an altitude of about 100 feet until it took of at a right angle from a dead hover to almost light speed and disappeared over the mountains.
